question.title: Playwright cannot find module './../../package.json'
question.body:
I'm using playwright-java for a few months now and suddenly I got the following error:

node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:1225
  const err = new Error(message);
              ^

Error: Cannot find module './../../package.json'
Require stack:
- C:\Users\BARAK~1.BEN\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\package\lib\utils\userAgent.js
- C:\Users\BARAK~1.BEN\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\package\lib\utils\index.js
- C:\Users\BARAK~1.BEN\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\package\lib\cli\programWithTestStub.js
- C:\Users\BARAK~1.BEN\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\package\cli.js
    at Module._resolveFilename (node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:1225:15)
    at Module._load (node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:1051:27)
    at Module.require (node:internal/modules/cjs/loader:1311:19)
    at require (node:internal/modules/helpers:179:18)
    at getPlaywrightVersion (C:\Users\BARAK~1.BEN\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\package\lib\utils\userAgent.js:91:54)
    at HarTracer.stop (C:\Users\BARAK~1.BEN\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\package\lib\server\har\harTracer.js:417:50)
    at Tracing.abort (C:\Users\BARAK~1.BEN\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\package\lib\server\trace\recorder\tracing.js:203:21)
    at CRBrowserContext._didCloseInternal (C:\Users\BARAK~1.BEN\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\package\lib\server\browserContext.js:199:18)
    at CRBrowserContext._browserClosed (C:\Users\BARAK~1.BEN\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\package\lib\server\browserContext.js:189:10)
    at CRBrowser._didClose (C:\Users\BARAK~1.BEN\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\package\lib\server\browser.js:128:52) {
  code: 'MODULE_NOT_FOUND',
  requireStack: [
    'C:\\Users\\BARAK~1.BEN\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\\package\\lib\\utils\\userAgent.js',
    'C:\\Users\\BARAK~1.BEN\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\\package\\lib\\utils\\index.js',
    'C:\\Users\\BARAK~1.BEN\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\\package\\lib\\cli\\programWithTestStub.js',
    'C:\\Users\\BARAK~1.BEN\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\playwright-java-2488518356231877608\\package\\cli.js'
  ]
}

Node.js v20.18.0

Looking in "C:\Users\BARAK~1.BEN\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-java-7117691253024733273" I can see only 'node.exe', which makes sense why the issue occurs. Why is it happening?

Looking around for answers I've tried many suggested solutions including invalidating cache (on IntelliJ IDEA), deleting all "C:\Users\BARAK~1.BEN\AppData\Local\Temp\playwright-java-*" folders, and more. Any ideas how to resolve the issue?

OS: Windows 10 Playwright version: playwright-java 1.49.0
